name: Capture the Flag (itch) (Néstor Piedra)
description:
A little testing game for didactic purposes using only unity primitive figures and with the limitation of using only the mouse to play. The game was developed in about 3 hours and polished a little bit later on.

You can move by pointing the cursor and pressing right click to make the player move, while the left click on the mouse will shoot. Grab the flat at the end of the platform and return to the beggining in order to win!
